author: jimmygchen
content:
Lighthouse update:
- We're able to start at Deneb and transition to Fulu
- Passing 1.5.0-beta.0 spec tests (including custody groups)
- Happy path works fine, and we've found a few sync bugs when we tried to restart nodes, fixes have been implemented
- Will retest next week and hopefully ready for interop some time next week

author: sibkatya
content: does it mean that kurtosis should work fine with peerdas?

author: jimmygchen
content: yes it should - this branch https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/6795 - but the bug fixes are on separate branches, so you may run into sync bugs
